issue_description:
# [Feature Request]: Update "translation is incomplete" message on contributor dashboard

### Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.

On the translation submission screen, if images and concept cards are not copied over, it is unclear what is missing and how to fix it. Here is a screenshot of what this currently looks like:

![Image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/117132709/223325845-a5b06b1c-4f5e-41d6-97f8-2d7b9c831ae2.png)

### Describe the solution (or solutions) you'd like

The design team would like to change this message to the following instead: 

"Translation is incomplete. Please use the Copy Tool to include any images or concept cards in the translated content."

### Describe alternatives you've considered and rejected

_No response_

### Additional context

See https://github.com/oppia/design-team/issues/67 for original discussion.

Here's a breakdown of the changes I propose to make in the `translation-modal.component.html` file: **Proposed Changes:** I will modify the `translation-modal.component.html` file, specifically in the section where the incomplete translation message is displayed. The current code looks like this: ```

Translation is incomplete. Please make sure all elements in the original content, e.g. images, are included in the translated content.

``` I will replace the existing message with the following: ```

Translation is incomplete. Please use the Copy Tool to include any images or concept cards in the translated content.

``` **Explanation:** The idea is to make the message more approachable. Instead of just saying "translation is incomplete," we're reassuring contributors and guiding them on exactly what to do – use the Copy Tool to include any missing images or concept cards.
